thanks for all the fabulous uploads over the years...(just registered today after having a long struggle with TBP registration) 

I have constantly seen "Requests are FROZEN" and therefore humbly request for the following when you have time. I have never found a copy of it ANYWHERE!

Many thanks for sharing your work...
Live Long and Prosper...
Spirit...

@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated for the genius that it is!

Be Cool !

20-40, I wanted to ask you what you think of Handbrake, this soft that converts to mkv and mp4.  Does it do a good job?

On a separate note, one movie I have not been able to get anywhere is 'The Cat's Meow', (2001), with Kirsten Dunst. Not possible for an mp4?

Many thanks as always for your uploads.  Truly admire the quality of what you do. :)
hey man thanks a lot for american ...and wish u happy new year :)

Thank you 20-40 for your kind remarks.  Yes, Cat's Meow has been hard to get.  I only got to see it once because it was featured in Asian HBO this past Tuesday.  Otherwise, I would have never heard of it.  

'Boardwalk Empire' looks to be another good one.  Looking forward to seeing it.  :)
Will you upload "Just Go With It"? Thankssss.=))
